content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, dear tenant. I'm glad that you're interested in renting it from me. However, I must clarify that the apartment is quite small, with only 25 square meters of living space. Given the limited size, I would like to establish a rental price that is commensurate with the market value of similar apartments in the area. What would you be willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: I agree to the rental price of 600 Euros per month, dear tenant. Thank you for your offer. I'll need to consider this proposal further and get back to you with my final decision.

content:
I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month.

I want to confirm that I will be responsible for paying all additional costs such as electricity, gas, and water bills.

I will also be responsible for maintaining the apartment in good condition and repairing any damages caused by me or my guests.

I will inform you as soon as I move in and will pay the first month's rent in advance.

I hope that we can come to an agreement on the rental price.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Max Müller

content:
I agree to the rental price of 550 Euros per month, dear tenant. Thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to take on responsibility for additional costs such as electricity, gas, and water bills. I also appreciate your willingness to maintain the apartment in good condition and repair any damages caused by you or your guests.

I will need to review your offer and confirm my final decision in writing. Please let me know if there are any other terms that you would like to add or if you have any questions. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
